about_the_game:
While Evil Reigns... you play the game as a guardian of your world, protecting the population from the growing evil forces that have risen. Optionally summon other guardians throughout the universe to support your call for aid!

Base

Your base contains crafting stations, spellbook creation and storage for all items found!

Combat

Combine potions, artifacts and much more to create a unique combat experience each session. Magic spells can be combined to explore new ways in combat!

Crafting

Ingredients and artifacts can be found throughout the game. These can be crafted into potions which enhance gameplay, abilities and stats! 

Town

The nearby town is a place where you can travel to to buy upgrades for the base. Many enhancements are useful even after death...

To follow the development of the game, watch Youtube, Instagram and TikTok

This page will be updated when more content is available

short_description: A CO-OP Magical Dark Fantasy Rogue-like game created with great admiration and passion of magic-lore and great combat. Set foot in a world strangled by the grip of evil presence. Fight a way through the never ending dispair and rid the world of this evil.
